channel.title: Npc Dialogue & Teleporting (PI) Rep for help
channel.description:
I have a Npc (id: 340), I want it to say, "Would you like to go to the almighty Barrelchester?" then have options "yes and no" and if you click "yes" you teleport to 2801 4720.
Regards, James.
